thread.title: Vair Clendenning

author: Vair Clendenning
title: Vair Clendenning
text: People are always asking if we will sit their pets and it is usually in our house. Through Trusted Housesitters we can travel in the winter and pet sit to supplement our travel without fear of the unknown. By the time we arrived at our last house sit we felt that we knew the people and their pets because of the communications we had with them through Trusted Housesitters. The systems Trusted Housesitters have set up, be it family information, pet personalities, or security makes one feel comfortable with the whole process.
